int llapi_json_escape_string ( char **  out_string,
char *  in_string 
)

Quick-n'-dirty JSON string escape routine.

Parameters:
[out] out_string JSON-escaped string, allocated here
[in] in_string Unescaped string
Return values:
0 on success.
-errno on error.
